title: Advice to a Prophet - best paraphrases line 36

content.question: Which of the following best paraphrases the meaning of line 36?

choices.label: When the end of the year has come
When art no longer imitates nature
When nature has ceased to exist
When the forests are finally restored

content.answer: When nature has ceased to exist

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
